function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Survival of COVID-19 particles on different materials and in different environments.","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission from contaminated surfaces and environments.","Mitigation":"Regular and thorough disinfection and cleaning of all possible COVID-19 virus sources.","Technologies":"Advanced disinfection technologies such as UV-C germicidal irradiation and electrostatic sprayers.","People":"General public, healthcare workers, cleaning staff.","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, cleaning companies, building management."},{"Description":"Discovery of SARS-CoV-2 virus RNA in hospital exterior environments and clinical departments.","Impact":"High-risk sites for possible SARS-CoV-2 infection, posing a threat to healthcare workers and patients.","Mitigation":"Strict infection control measures, regular environmental monitoring, and thorough cleaning and disinfection.","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring devices, rapid testing kits for surfaces and wastewater.","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, cleaning staff.","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, environmental service departments, public health authorities."}]}
